title: Human Resource Manager Job at Kiyix Recruitment Hub
content:
Kiyix is a HR consulting firm that helps organisations recruit best candidates and Manges all hr related activities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently hiring a qualified and experienced Human Resource Manager to lead and manage the HR department in alignment with organizational objectives.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Develop, review, and implement HR policies, strategies, and procedures.
	Manage the full recruitment and selection process.
	Oversee onboarding, training, and career development programs.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, statutory regulations, and internal policies.
	Handle employee relations, grievances, and disciplinary matters.
	Manage payroll, benefits, and performance management systems.
	Foster a positive workplace culture and promote employee engagement.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, or related discipline (Master’s degree or HR certification is an added advantage).
	Minimum of 5 years of practical experience in HR management.
	Strong knowledge of labor laws, HR policies, and best practices.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills.
	High level of professionalism, integrity, and confidentiality.
	Proficiency in HR software and Microsoft Office Suite.


Salary
N300,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kicvacancy@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "description": "Nigeria Sinotruck Limited is a commercial automotive company that is interested in starting a vendor leasing desk.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Social Media Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Onsite

Job Summary


	We&#39;re seeking a skilled Social Media Manager that will be responsible for creating engaging content, editing videos, updating our website, and ensuring seamless integration between our website and various social media platforms, including LinkedIn Facebook and Instagram.


Key Responsibilities
Content Creation:


	Develop and curate high-quality, engaging content (text, images, videos) for social media platforms.
	Ensure content aligns with our brand voice and messaging.


Video Editing:


	Produce and edit high-quality video content that tells our brand story and engages our audience.


Website Management:


	Update and maintain our website content to reflect current promotions, events, and organizational news.
	Optimize website performance to enhance user experience and improve search engine rankings.


Social Media Integration:


	Create and manage links between our website and social media platforms, driving traffic and increasing brand visibility.
	Create and schedule posts, respond to comments and messages, and engage with our online community.


Engagement and Community Management:


	Interact with followers across platforms to foster community engagement and build brand loyalty.
	Respond to inquiries and feedback in a timely and professional manner.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3-4 years of experience in social media management, content creation, and video editing.
	Professional certification in Hootsuite or HubSpot is an added advantage.
	Proficiency in website management tools and social media analytics.
	Strong communication skills and a creative mindset.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@sinotrucknigeria.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Social Media Specialist Job at Nigeria Sinotruck Limited




        
    

        
        Nigeria Sinotruck Limited is a commercial automotive company that is interested in starting a vendor leasing desk.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Specialist

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Onsite

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're seeking a skilled Social Media Manager that will be responsible for creating engaging content, editing videos, updating our website, and ensuring seamless integration between our website and various social media platforms, including LinkedIn Facebook and Instagram.


Key Responsibilities
Content Creation:


	Develop and curate high-quality, engaging content (text, images, videos) for social media platforms.
	Ensure content aligns with our brand voice and messaging.


Video Editing:


	Produce and edit high-quality video content that tells our brand story and engages our audience.


Website Management:


	Update and maintain our website content to reflect current promotions, events, and organizational news.
	Optimize website performance to enhance user experience and improve search engine rankings.


Social Media Integration:


	Create and manage links between our website and social media platforms, driving traffic and increasing brand visibility.
	Create and schedule posts, respond to comments and messages, and engage with our online community.


Engagement and Community Management:


	Interact with followers across platforms to foster community engagement and build brand loyalty.
	Respond to inquiries and feedback in a timely and professional manner.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3-4 years of experience in social media management, content creation, and video editing.
	Professional certification in Hootsuite or HubSpot is an added advantage.
	Proficiency in website management tools and social media analytics.
	Strong communication skills and a creative mindset.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@sinotrucknigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
